game_description: Alexandria - Port of Worlds, has been conceived and designed as a futuristic port, acting as both a symbolic cultural hub and a launching point into other worlds. We invite you to join the world of Alexandria, meet and connect with other creators and experience curated, immersive pieces by the Cannes XR and NewImages Festival.
review_1: Beautiful! It's a VR art museum with multiplayer, or something to that effect, and everything looks so posh and your above the clouds and the whole deal. Bravo.
